name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger
summary:
G'day, Mate. Explore the wilds of Australia with TY the Tasmanian Tiger, the charming Aussie platformer. Stone the crows! Are you ready to explore the wilds of the Australian Outback in this remastered version of the classic game, TY the Tasmanian Tiger?

Join TY on a ripper of an adventure to free his family from the dreaming and stop the nefarious evil genius boss cass from removing mammals from the top of the food chain.

To help you on your quest, you've got a beaut arsenal of boomerangs, sharp teeth, and the help of a few friends!

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue
summary: STREWTH! It's time to go back Down Under with this fully remastered version of TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue. Rang, bite, smash and glide your way around the Australian Outback and stop the evil machinations of the diabolical BOSS CASS in this open world adventure.

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan
summary: TY and his mates face their biggest challenge yet - an otherworldly invasion by an ancient evil known as the Quinkan. With Bush Rescue disbanded, TY begins the challenging task of reforming his team and leading the fight against the dark oppressors. In this next chapter, players will embark on a series of engaging missions and challenges filled with new and upgradeable weapons - including his trade mark boomerang collection -- and vehicles. TY's new adventures will take him into a shadowy world full of dangerous creatures, and will see him face bigger and badder enemies.

name: Tyrian
summary:
Tyrian is a scrolling shooter computer game developed by World Tree Games Productions and published in 1995 by Epic MegaGames.
The game was officially released as freeware in 2004, and the graphics were made available under an open license in April 2007.
Tyrian was programmed by Jason Emery, illustrated by Daniel Cook, and its music composed by Alexander Brandon and Andras Molnar.

name: Tycoon City: New York
summary:
Here's your chance to make it big in the Big Apple... New York City, the city that never sleeps! Go for broke building your own Manhattan empire, creating and customising over 100 types of major businesses: run a hot nightclub, oversee a media conglomerate, open a lucrative Broadway theatre - the choices are endless. As your success grows, so will your reputation - you'll be the toast of Manhattan, with the city at your feet.

With world-renowned landmarks, true-to-life neighbourhoods, and spectacular New York City events, you're constantly in the thick of the action, becoming a major mogul in America's most exciting metropolis. High-profile industries, real-world brands, and a bustling 24-hour city give every player the chance to make it big.

name: Typoman
summary:
Typoman is a two dimensional puzzle platformer distinguished by a unique game world. You slip into the role of the HERO struggling to make your way through a dark, surreal world. Despite your small stature you have a powerful gift: You can use letters to alter your environment!

Be the HERO and set out on the journey to become whole and gain the powers you need to defeat the giant, evil demon that rules the world you are trapped in.

name: Tyrants: Fight Through Time
summary:
First you choose one out of four different characters to represent you, Scarlet (red army), Oberon (yellow army), Caesar (green army), or Madcap (blue army). The game is split into 10 levels - the first 9 are groups of 3 territories which can be completed in any order, while the final 'Mother of All Battles' has its own surprises.

Land is mostly of sand, grass or ice. You start with 100 men and you can use whatever quantity you find necessary on each island. The rest men left will go to another level with another new 100. In the second half of the game you can freeze men to save them for the Mother of All Battles. Once you select your island and place for your HQ, you must do some research for better weapons and defences. On the roof of your buildings you can put protectors like archers, gunmen, boiling oil men, and later on even laser turrets. If you send a team of unarmed men into an unoccupied square, they will build an additional base there, with larger armies completing this more quickly.

Later on higher levels, you'll also build mines and factories, as you'll need to dig a certain material for higher level weapons, depending on whether the area you're on is rich with a certain material or not. With each next level, you'll start from a higher technology level and be able to progress to one higher level up than at the previous level

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4
summary: The hero loved by millions worldwide, TY the Tasmanian Tiger, is back! Join TY on an exciting new adventure in the great Aussie Outback. Use your wits and boomerangs to find hidden treasures, help the colorful locals, and uncover the mysteries of the land Down Under.

name: Tyrian 2000
summary: Tyrian 2000 is an updated rerelease of the original Tyrian. Tyrian is an action killing, smashing, shoot'em'all arcade game. Your goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and finish the level, buy more weapons and then kill many more enemies. Your battle ship can be improved over time and you can buy new weapons currently available. Your ship supports front guns, rear guns and side slots for the most deadly weapons.

name: Type: Rider
summary: Type:Rider is an adventure puzzle game that brings gaming experience to a whole new daring level.

name: Tyranny
summary: Experience a story-driven RPG where your choices mean all the difference in the world.

name: Typefighters
summary: Typefighters is a competitive multiplayer game where two players battle each other using their typing skills. Its variety of modes does not only emphasise typing speed and correctness, but also other skills like reaction time, sustained attention, creativity, tactics and anticipating the opponents moves. Aside from being a tool to settle arguments on who is the best on a keyboard, the game can also be used for training purposes.

name: Typer Shark! Deluxe
summary: Sink your teeth into this action-packed educational adventure. Hungry sharks and piranhas are on the hunt as you SCUBA dive around them. Type words fast to zap the predators... before they turn you into lunch!

name: Typeshift
summary: A word puzzle game for iOS.

name: Tyler: Model 005
summary: Tyler: Model-005 is a 3D action-platformer and exploration game set in the 1950s where you control a spunky miniature robot named Tyler. Many years after being shut down, Tyler is accidentally powered up during the height of a thunderstorm. You set off with Tyler to discover why your creator is missing and what has happened to your home, which is now overrun with robot-sized rats, cockroaches, and more.

name: Tyrfing Cycle
summary:
Tyrfing cycle is a fast paced, twitch based Action-Rogue-like
Hack and Slash your way through various Dungeons and realms in this Norse themed RogueLike.

name: Tyto Online
summary: Tyto Online is a MMORPG where you play as an evacuee from the now uninhabitable Earth. You're settling on the planet Ovo to study at Tyto Academy as you establish your new life. Explore and complete quests while learning real science concepts.

name: Typing with Jester
summary: Typing with Jester is a typing game with a 8-Bit Retro fourscale style. Imagine those classic handhelds had a keyboard and a game like this. Sounds awesome right?

name: Tyto Ecology
summary:
In Tyto Ecology, you have the power to create your own biodome and fill it with life!
This is a calm, slow-paced game (at least until things start going wrong) that encourages learning through experimentation as you work to sustain, or destroy, life. Up to a year of time can pass while you are away, so you come back to changes in your ecosystem and potentially several problems to handle each time you return to the game.

name: Tyran
summary:
This is unusual mix of an RPG and strategy genres, 
simple to learn, but hard to master non casual gameplay.

name: Tyler
summary: Tyler is a puzzle/arcade videogame. Solve all the puzzles by drawing the right combination of flows and destroying all the obstacles on the Grid! You can also play in 1vs1 or team coop 2vs2 multiplayer mode.

name: Type & Tell
summary:
Type & Tell! lets the player type in a word or a message and then have the words spoken back to them by utilizing the Odyssey 2's voice module. 
 
The instruction manual suggests the following games that can be played: 
 
Garble! - Players take turns typing in one letter at a time, The idea is to form sentences by just using the sounds the individual letters make. 
 
Sound Waves! - Players type in random letters trying to create sounds that sound like something that could be heard in real life. 
 
Super Star! - Players can use the sounds or dialogue the game makes in their own home movie or radio show. 
 
War of Words! - This game requires at least two players. Player take turns typing in words until a sentence is created by one of the players adding a period. Players then take turns inserting words into the sentence, while trying to keep it grammatically correct. The first player to extend the sentence exactly to the end of the available typing space is the winner. If a player extends the sentence beyond the end of that available space, they lose.
publishers: North American Philips Consumer Electronics Corp.

name: Typo Man
summary:
Typo Man appears very similar to Typo II. 
 
In this Pac-Man style clone you must navigate the map through correct keystrokes displayed on the map. Once all objectives are completed the map is cleared and a new map is displayed. 
 
Watch out for the ghost gloves!

name: Typo II
summary:
Journey into the land of enhanced reality with TYPO II. This exciting educational game is by ROMOX, for your Texas Instruments 99/4A Home Computer. TYPO II is an educational and fun challenger for one player at a time. 
 
In TYPO II you can learn and improve your typing skills while enjoying the high speed action of a real arcade game on your home computer. No more long hours at the keyboard for you, with nothing to do but type. In TYPO II you control the action! Arid while you play, you learn. TYPO II is a fun and challenging maze game where you, the player control the letter crunching jaws. As you eat your way through the realms of letters, you are chased and hounded at every bend by the Protectors of the Word. The Protectors, also known as boxing gloves, want but one thing: to knock you out! So beware, quick thinking and agile fingers will carry you through.

name: Tyco R/C: Assault with a Battery
summary: Taking RC racing to the next level, TYCO RC: Assault With a Battery is every schoolyard remote-controlled racer's dream come true. Choose one of eight RC cars modeled after real life Tyco-brand toy racers such as The Recoil, Fast Traxx and Hot Rocker. Each racer is completely unique and brandishes it's own signature maneuver breaking out with awesome offensive or defensive moves, or even morphing into a menacing super car. Race as Tantrum, replete with a front-spinning axle that damages all in it's path; Nitro-Dozer, with the ability to transform into a powerful bulldozer; or even Speed Wrench, a monster truck that becomes an on-road terror twice it's width. The elaborate detail in the construction of the vehicles is also found in such features as each individual racer's speed, acceleration rate, turning ratio, and all-out power. Test your skills in Single-Player mode or challenge your friends in Two-Player. With theme-based courses designed for maximum mayhem, TYCO RC: Assault With a Battery delivers all the excitement without having to tell Mom you destroyed another car.

name: Tyranny: Tales from the Tiers
summary:
Tales from The Tiers expands your journey through the war-torn world of award-winning role-playing game Tyranny, with new travel map events, encounters, and side stories. 
 
Outwit hostile ambushes, patronize or plunder traveling merchants, and use your skills to navigate the perils of a land plagued by magical Edicts in a series of episodes that offer new insights, new items, and new challenges on your journey.

name: Tyranny: Commander Edition
summary:
Players will experience the new world order under Overlord in a reactive role-playing game, interacting with the populace as a powerful Fatebinder in the Overlord's forces -- roaming the lands to inspire loyalty or fear as they bring control to the last holdouts of the Tiers.

Tyranny: Commander Edition includes:
Base Game
Ringtones (three notification tones and one ringtone - located in the Ringtones folder under the game installation directory)

name: Tyd wag vir Niemand
summary:
Manipulate time to your will at any moment to solve challenges, avoid deadly traps and make it to the end of this strange journey.

Tyd wag vir Niemand is an indie abstract adventure filled with mystical environments that will put your abilities to the test and engage you in a world of mystery and wonder.

name: Typoman: Revised
summary: Typoman is a 2D puzzle platformer. You slip into the role of a character made of letters, struggling to make your way through a dark and hostile world. Despite your small stature you have a powerful gift: You can use words to alter your environment. But choose your words wisely. They can either be a blessing... or a curse!

name: Tyranny: Bastard's Wound
summary: Experience a new chapter of Tyranny, the critically-acclaimed role-playing game, in Bastard's Wound, a new expansion that builds upon the game's compelling story. Tyranny invites the player to make their mark on a world conquered by evil, and the Bastard's Wound expansion opens up a new area of the Tiers where refugees from the war-torn world have established a haven in secret.

name: Type da Puyo Puyo
summary: Type da Puyo Puyo is a typing game featuring characters from the Puyo Puyo series.

name: Typing Shuugyou: Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi Zero
summary: This was the third typing game from the Hokuto No Ken series.

name: Typing Haou: Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi 2
summary: This is a typing game that is a sequel to the first typing game.

name: Typing Ougi: Hokuto no Ken Gekiuchi
summary: This is a typing game from the Hokuto No Ken series where typing words kills the enemies.

name: Typingmania 5 Odyssey
summary: An editable lyrics Flash typing game. Type the lyrics as the song plays.

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger: Boomerang Blast
summary: First person boomerang flingin'.

name: Typing Karaoke
summary: A music-based typing game.

name: Type Attacks
summary: Type Attacks is an XNA community game

name: Typhoon Thompson in Search for the Sea Child
summary: Typhoon Thompson in Search for the Sea Child is a Shoot 'Em Up for the Amiga and Atari ST.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Typhoon Thompson in Search for the Sea Child

name: Tyred
summary:
Scream in shock and excitement at the sight of homicidal, pugnacious tyres battling it out in this fantastic, hilarious party game. You’ll never get Tyred of it. You wheelie wont!
Ideal for parties and small gatherings due to the fast-paced gameplay and easy-to-learn controls.

name: Tyde Pod Challenge
summary: Tyde Pod Challenge isn't for kids! But for professionals only! Take control of V8 powered police cruiser with upgraded suspension, turbo and nitrous. Drift on designated drift-track, get drifting points and collect "tyde" pods. Task isn't as easy as you might think it is. Challege it!

name: Tyrfing Cycle |Vanilla|
summary:
Tyrfing cycle is a fast paced, twitch based Action-Rogue-like
Hack and Slash your way through various Dungeons and realms in this Norse themed RogueLike.

name: Typefighters: Steam Edition
summary: Typefighters is a competitive multiplayer game where two players battle each other using their typing skills. Its variety of modes does not only emphasise typing speed and correctness, but also other skills like reaction time, sustained attention, creativity, tactics and anticipating the opponents moves. Aside from being a tool to settle arguments on who is the best on a keyboard, the game can also be used for training purposes.

name: Type
summary: In Type you can play on more than 5 Modes at 3 Difficulties. Playing on Easy is just a warm up, Playing on Medium is just playing a normal game, Playing on Hard is another different story. It will give you some fun, challenge and may improve your skills at typing.

name: Tyr: Chains of Valhalla
summary: Tyr: Chains of Valhalla, inspired by Norse mythology, is a 2.5D shooter/platformer full of power-ups, vikings, robots, awesome and difficult bosses. It combines 3D scenarios and bosses with 2D characters and enemies.

name: Typical nightmare
summary: Typical Nightmare is a narrative horror game based on real cases from psychological practice. It tells the story of an ordinary guy named John that is trapped in his nightmares. Find out what force keeps him there and make everything to rescue John from his Typical Nightmare!

name: Type Defense
summary: Write to fight! Desert bandits are coming, defend your castle! Everyone knows typing is the best way to use a ballista!

name: Type Fighter
summary:
Type Fighter is a game of typing words to perform actions. Stay alive and run as far as you can.

Run, type, kill, die, repeat.

name: Typical
summary: A single declaration of love changes everything! Will Amaterasu be able to maintain her friendships, or lose them forever? Will cherished memories sour, or will she find the strength and resolve to overcome her troubles?

name: Typing Space Harrier
summary: Typing Space Harrier is a game released exclusively in Japan which aims to teach people how to type using a keyboard.

name: Typhon
summary: Typhon is a thrilling first person horror experience where players must solve puzzle to uncover a haunting mystery, while avoiding a terrifying monster.

name: Typing game
summary: "Typing Game" is the perfect game to train your typing in a serious and more relaxed way thanks to its three difficulties

name: Typing Incremental
summary: In Typing Incremental, type words to earn money, spend money to unlock new words. Repeat until you can prestige to gain permanent bonuses.

name: Type Dreams
summary: Choose from panoply of tools, exercises, stats / analytica, and personalized guidance from World's Fastest Typist Sean "Arenasnow" Wrona to speed your ascent into typing mastery as you prepare to race the fastest qwerticians ever to touch the home row.

name: Type Knight
summary: Type Knight is a short atmospheric typing game. Type as fast as you can on your keyboard to survive. Discover what lies at the end of the cemetery at the cost of your life.

name: Type II
summary: Take control of an automated defense systems protecting planets 40 light years away from Earth. Type II refers to Type II civilization on a Kardashev scale.

name: Typing Hero
summary: In a world filled with Zombies, a Spec Ops squad tries to survive and make their way through Hordes of Zombies to reach their final destination.

name: Typhoon Unit: Butterfly Requiem
summary: Squad up! Switch heroes on the fly, and chase down the Steel Butterfly in a world where magic and technology intertwine! Are you the right team for the job?

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger HD
summary:
G'day Mate. Are you ready to explore the wilds of the Australian Outback in this remastered version of the classic game, TY the Tasmanian Tiger?
Join TY on a RIPPER of an adventure to free his family from the Dreaming, through 17 levels of the Australian Outback, in their old-school 3D platforming glory!

name: Tycoon Tex
summary: Jump 'n' run in which you are Tycoon Tex, the oil tycoon, who has to protect his pipeline.

name: Typing Warrior
summary: Get ready to become the Typing Warrior, practicing your keyboard skills as you blow away enemies on land, at sea, and in the air. There are dazzling graphics and sounds, and a scorekeeping function that lets you track your progress. Typing Warrior is fun and easy to use for all ages!

name: Typing of the Date
summary:
Is a Sega Dreamcast game. It is built to use the Dreamcast Keyboard.

The game is a dating simulation but in order to progress the player has to type in certain words within specific time frames. Not only the concept but also the name of the game are referencing The Typing of the Dead.

name: Typing Quest
summary: Play and learn with the first typing game for Switch! According to new educational guidelines, programming became a required subject in elementary school starting in 2020. And while the focus tends to be on the programs, typing is the equivalent of holding a pencil to learn writing for children who are using a computer for the first time. Being able to look up while accurately inputting keystrokes during class is the equivalent of looking at the blackboard while writing notes. And since you are going to be learning, why not improve your skills while playing on a game console?

name: Typo
summary: Typo is puzzle-driven sidescrolling adventure. Find your way through a mysterious testing lab, type and spawn what you need to survive in this love letter to the puzzle-platformer, solving tens of unique puzzles in a hand-crafted world.

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue HD
summary: TY puts the BOOM in BOOMERANG! TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue is the sequel to Krome Studios' charming Australiana-themed videogame. This classic platformer, updated for Nintendo Switch, features more rangs, more vehicles, more bots, and more EVERYTHING... in an open world Aussie Adventure. Throw boomerangs, bite, smash and glide your way around the Australian Outback and stop the evil plans of the wicked Boss Cass and help the good folk of the little country town of BURRAMUDGEE. This sequel to the popular TY the Tasmanian Tiger is a game on a grander scale. In addition to classic platforming elements, you'll fight Aussie bush fires from a helicopter, drive around Southern Rivers while hanging on to the back of a four-wheel drive and use the bots to defeat enemies and solve puzzles - all while trying to find a variety of different collectables. And now, only on the HD remaster, you can customize TY's looks, and best of all there are two brand NEW never before seen boomerangs.

name: Typing Hearts
summary: Typing hearts is a brand new dating sim in which you combine your typing skills with your ability to chat with girls. It features a unique fast-paced typing game and an immersive operating system to showcase your story where every choice counts.

name: Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane
summary: Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane is a visual novel inspired by the Ace Attorney series. You play as a defense attorney who practices law in a world of fantasy and wizards. You must defend clients accused of various crimes committed using magic and use the rules of magic to prove them innocent. However, the system is corrupt to its core and manipulated by the aristocracy. Will you acquit your innocent clients in light of that? Or will you fall before a corrupt judicial system?

name: Tyrannis
summary: Tyrannis is an asymmetric, turn-based strategy game that pits overstretched armies of mercenaries against small rebel groups across an American dystopia.

name: Tyrgard Archer VR
summary: Prepare yourself against the incoming hordes of unique enemies! Dodge flying spears, magical ravens and kamikaze dragons! Immerse yourself in a stylish low-poly environment. Upgrade your bow, improve your skill and become the champion Tyrgard needs you to be!

name: Typing Instructor for Kids Platinum 5
summary: Kids learn to type on an exciting adventure on Typer Island. They learn all keyboard basics following one of 11 age-appropriate Typing Plans. Step-by-step lessons, challenges, tests, and games motivate kids to keep typing their way around the Island to reach the Castle, advance to the Lost City, and become touch-typists!

name: Typing with Sharks
summary: This action-packed, underwater adventure will help you master challenging keys on the keyboard. Type words quickly to zap hungry sharks and piranhas before they attack your submarine.

name: Tybot Invasion: The Typing Runner
summary: Type words quickly to destroy robots, move among lanes, and destroy all the enemy's waves on this invasion that mixes Typing & Run! The future of Robworld is in your hands, can you destroy all robots fast enough? Type for your life. Type for the future.

name: Tyke and Sons Lumber Co.
summary: Tyke and Sons Lumber Co. is a fanmade sequel to one of Scott Cawthon's earlier games, "Chipper and Sons Lumber Co.".

name: Tyranny: Gold Edition
summary: Experience a story-driven RPG where your choices mean all the difference in the world. Tyranny - Gold Edition, the ultimate Tyranny experience that includes every Tyranny Expansion and all additional DLC.

name: Typed82
summary: A simple typing experience to complement your keyboard. Typed'82 immerses you in an atmospheric typing experience. As you progress and improve your typing skills, the visuals and music set a pleasing environment.

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger HD + TY the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue HD Bundle
summary:
Explore 17 levels of the Australian Outback in their old-school 3D platforming glory
13 different boomerangs including the Frostyrang, Flamerang and powerful Doomerang.

name: Tyrannosaurus Tex
summary: Cancelled science-fiction western themed First-Person Shooter for the Gameboy Colour, Originally developed by Slitherine. The rights and prototype were bought by retro indie publisher Piko Interactive, Who finished and released the game on boxed GBC cartridge.

name: Tyfortress: Tactical Typing
summary: Protect human race last fortress against the robots by typing phrases and single words! Build and evolve towers that will help while you destroy robots by typing their words! Oh, and don't forget... Before that, you'll need to type phrases fast to gather a good amount of resources to build towers!

name: Tyrania: A Kinetic Visual Novel
summary: Tyrania is a kinetic visual novel, meaning a text-based game with a one ending linear story. The story is focused on the opposition of two different ideas of Justice when dealing with crime and terrorism.

name: Typing Fingers: Enemy
summary: The destiny of humanity lies in your hands, take the brain-ship and battle against unknown alien enemies, across the universe in order to regain control and the peace stolen for us. Only the fastest and most accurate typing master will conquer them all.

name: Tyrant's Blessing
summary: Tyrant's Blessing is a tactical turn-based game where your ability to plan, adapt, and strategize is more important than min-maxing your units or finding the sharpest sword in the hoard. Select battles every day, make challenging choices, and cleverly use the strengths of these rag-tag insurgents to defeat the undead hordes and maybe - just maybe - bring real life back to Tyberia.

name: Typing Fingers
summary: Meet Dennis your new instructor that will teach you how to touch-type correctly and efficiently on the keyboard in a fun way with beautiful design and music. Each of the 32 levels is divided into 3 phases: Learn, Play, and Test, which will help you to practice enough to develop your typing skills.

name: Tyto Ecology: Cretaceous Mongolia
summary: A dinosaur biodome is here, with the Cretaceous Mongolia! Explore an ecosystem from 70 million years ago as you place velociraptor, therizinosaurus, tarbosaurus, and more!

name: Tyto Ecology: Alaskan Tundra Ecosystem
summary: The Alaskan tundra comes with 23 new species of producers, consumers, and decomposers for our first arctic biodome. Polar bears, caribou, arctic hares, and more!

name: Tyto Ecology: Himalayas Ecosystem
summary: Red pandas, tigers, and bears, oh my! This DLC packs many amazing species in the Himalayas ecosystem for a brand new biodome. $1 from each purchase will be donated to the World Wildlife Fund.

name: Typer Hero
summary: Typer Hero is a typing game with two different difficulty modes, however survive mode will only appear once you have completed the game.

name: Typomancer in the Feather's Way
summary: Run, jump and type words to conjure spells and help your typing wizard to disinfect the platforming TyWorld from the slime monsters! Be prepared to type a lot, because it will allow you to reload your feather and control the world around you.

name: Typhoon Force: Storm Fighter
summary: Typhoon Force: Storm Fighter is a shoot'em up where you pilot a spaceship and navigate your way through the end of the game by fighting swarms of enemies.

name: Tyrant's Realm
summary: Tyrant's Realm is a challenging action roguelike. Fill your arsenal with weapons and armor each with their unique gameplay mechanics. Tread carefully in this dark fantasy world because every enemy you face could be your end.

name: Typewriter Simulator
summary: Realistic typewriter simulator with importing and exporting!

name: Type to Continue
summary:
You wake up alone in a seemingly infinite hotel hallway.
You're tasked with writing down the names of all the tenants, but... something is following you.

name: Typos and Brains
summary: Help the zombie escape from a mansion... with typing!

name: TyperWorldCup
summary: Soccer X Typing-Tutor A Game for Ludum Dare 41 Jam

name: Type: Unstable Vampire
summary: 4KB Typing Infinite Runner

name: Typeds
summary: The space war started here and now! The victory depends only on you and all your years as a gamer. Show what you are capable of and destroy everything by writing quickly and correctly! "The keyboard is your weapon!"

name: Type 'n Jump
summary: A text-based platformer, made for Ludum Dare 41 | Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

name: Typing Champ 1987
summary: A short typing rpg for a game by its cover 2017

name: Tyroom vs. Typing Gunner
summary: Our typing gunner robot must survive in the feared Tyroom, lucky him he'll help him. Type words to teleport, explode bombs, destroy towers while you dodge and shoot robots down! Try to survive all the waves and get to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Typing Land
summary: A fun and exciting typing game. Learn how to type through 40 kinds of mini-games! We have developed this app as a safe platform for children and adults around the world to use.

name: Tyrone vs Cops
summary: Awaken the latent power of your melanin and kill cops in this thought-provoking game on police brutality in America.

name: Tynk! and the Final Phonorecord
summary: Tynk! and the Final Phonorecord is a story about creating art, making friends, and exploring the weird grey area that exists between art and commodity. It's a goofy, thoughtful and sometimes moody little adventure starring an overzealous musician, Tynk Nimbus, on a quest to make her new album the next big thing. Solve puzzles, avoid bodily harm, and travel the coast on your quest to show your album to everyone who's anyone! Just remember to brace yourself-- safely navigating feedback is Tynk's biggest challenge yet.

name: Tyrant Quest: Gold Edition
summary: Tyrant Quest is an erotic, dark fantasy visual novel about a Dark Lord who seeks revenge after being sealed away for a hundred years. And so he sets out with his last loyal subject, the succubus Lili, seeking a way to regain his power!

name: Type the Entire of Ulysses. That's It. That's the Game.
summary: Finally, a typing game with the entire of James Joyce's Ulysses in it. In "Type The Entire Of Ulysses. That's It. That's The Game." you will type out Ulysses and pretty much nothing else.

name: Typer Girl
summary: Enemies will continue to appear from the right side of the screen. All enemies will have a word above their heads, and you need to use the keyboard to type the correct letter to kill them before they reach the edge of the screen.

name: TypeRush
summary: TypeRush brings typing racers together! Compete against other talented typists around the globe.

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan
summary: Crikey! TY is back with a brand new adventure, in this fully remastered version of TY the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan. Pick up your rangs; pull on your shorts, and prepare to rescue the southern rivers from a brand new threat - the Quinkan...

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue
summary: Game Boy advance port of theb ps2/xbox/gamecube title

name: Tyrone vs Cops VR
summary: Awaken the latent power of your melanin and kill cops in this thought-provoking game on police brutality in America... Now in highly immersive first-person VR, and with all new gameplay mechanics!

name: Typo
summary: In this VR narrative game, you must fight your way to escape Athena's testing facility. After she enslaved the planet, you now find yourself doomed to repeat the same arbitrary tests, however, you may be able to escape... Do you have what it takes?

name: Tyken
summary: This is an indie game made by a solo developer set in the very distant future. You are a condemned prisoner forced to destroy the monsters at a clandestine genetic research facility located on planet Tyken. Use futuristic energy weapons in 10 unique environments.

name: TypeOut
summary: This isn't your typical typing test. Unlock Powerups, create a loadout, and battle your way through prompts as fast and accurately as you can to allocate powerups and strategically attack your opponents in an effort to slow them down.

name: Typing de Ai wo Tsutae yo
summary: This game is for Japanese only. Typing de Ai wo Tsutae yo is a typing game for Japanese. Players must type poop-related words as quickly and accurately as possible. Even if you are not good at typing, you can have fun practicing with this game.

name: Tyler Tactics
summary: Join Tyler Tactics on an absurd action-comedy adventure as he faces off against corrupt politicians, rival businessmen, and innocent bystanders alike.

name: Typing Tempo
summary: Typing Tempo is a 41-key 2D typing rhythm game developed by Rainbeat Games.

name: Tyrium
summary:
Tyrium is a real-time strategy game where you build a base and harvest the valuable mineral Tyrium. This resource is refined into credits, which you use to grow your economy and expand your army. Collector units ensure a steady flow of resources.

Your objective: Build a powerful force of tanks, rocket launchers, and infantry units to attack the enemy base and take control of the map. Victory is achieved by destroying either the enemy headquarters or all opposing units.

name: Tycoon Legends
summary: Will you rise to the top and become a Tycoon Legend?

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 3: Night of the Quinkan
Type King
summary: Type King has three different game modes: Typing, Jumping and those combined makes Type King! With some variety and different difficulties there is a total of fifteen levels to beat before you can be crowned the Type King!

name: Typing Bullets
summary: Typing Bullets is an arcade typing roguelite game, where you learn new words, you practice your typing skills, all while fighting against enemies based off of keyboard keys. Upgrade and customize your character, and if you get overwhelmed by your foes, respawn instantly through the quiz mechanic.

name: Typing of Ys
summary: The Ys Typing Tutor game is a normally hidden mini-game included with the full Zwei!! PC game that can be unlocked provided certain conditions are met. It is based mostly around Ys II Complete, both in sprites and text related material.

name: Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity
summary: Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity is sequel to our first game Tyrannis, and it brings back the accessible turn-based asymmetric gameplay as you fight a massive megacorporation along the Pacific Rim. Battle the Kirihara Group's Security Division across 40 new maps and a brand new campaign mode!

name: Typhon: Bot vs. Bot
summary:
Typhon: BvB lets you command modular mechs in a sci-fi tactical strategy game where you outthink rivals by scripting your bots with Python. A player has to customize, adapt, and evolve their forces in real time in the hostile alien world of AEGIS IVb to dominate the battlefield.

Typhon is a tactical sandbox built entirely in Python, where code is part of the battlefield. Every unit, behavior, and system is written in a language designed for clarity, flexibility, and full player control.

name: Tyrant
summary: 5-map wad, Egyptian-themed. Pistol-starts are recommended, but not necessary.

name: Tyrant's Twilight
summary: In a fantasy world where the chosen one is dead, forge a new hope for humanity. Command allies across the battlefield in turn-based tactical gameplay, but be prepared to get your hands dirty in over-the-shoulder combat as you slash, shoot, pierce and cast spells at your foes in real time action.

name: Tyrone Soulz
summary: It was supposed to be an uneventful arrest, but after the suspect made a blood pact with Moloch, this rookie cop is in for much more than he bargained for. Can he defeat Tyrone and return home to his family?

name: TY the Tasmanian Tiger 4: Bush Rescue Returns
summary: Explore a ripper new side of TY the Tasmanian Tiger with this fair dinkum, comic-style side scrolling adventure!

name: Tyre Trax
summary: Get set for the race of your life. With Tyre Trax you are about to embark on a daredevil race across challenging terrain avoiding obstacles and traps. Can you brave the cold and dark? Are you up to the challenge? Oil your chain, test your brakes and grab your helmet, but first, read these instructions. Happy trails!

name: Typecast
summary: Typecast is a bullet hell where you type to shoot. Get swarmed by enemies, manage the chaos, and climb the leaderboards in this unique arcade experience.

name: Tyrannizer
summary:
Tyrannizer is a first-person shooter game with a mix of sci-fi and fantasy elements, likely inspired by Quake. The player character uses a sword for a close-rangge weapon alongside modern era firearms, but the game is set in a medieval looking castle populated with mythical creatures.

The game was developed with the ACKNEX 3D GameStudio construction set, which is more similar to the Build 2.5D engine than to the true 3D Quake engine, and uses sprites for enemies, items and decorations. Build-engine like advanced features are used like bridges or balconies that can be walked on and passed under, and the ability to swim underwater.

name: Type Your Fate
summary: Type your fate. Arm yourself with your keyboard and your wits, and try to escape from the abandoned house where you are. Unfortunately, you won't be alone...

name: Tyalband
summary: Enter the mountain of glass, Oronmaril! An incomplete traditional roguelike for the Playdate.

name: Typing Battle
summary: "Typing Battle" is a game based on typing speed and accuracy. In this game, players need to use the keyboard to input designated characters in order to defeat their opponents or achieve their goals.

name: Tyrannical Chickens
summary: Chickens have started a despotic uprising in this 2D shooter, and you are tasked with putitng it down. Buy guns, upgrade them, kill chickens - and die. Over. And over. And over.

name: Tyko's Dying Together
summary: Experts Say Playing This Game Can Lead To Prosperity, Good Luck, And Long Life.

name: Typing Simulator
summary: Typing Simulator is not a game, it's the future. Learn to type. Get fast. High scores, leader-boards and speed running, all in VR.

name: Typical Cliche
summary: So obvious and typical story, just puzzle and dodge traps. (English version will be provided soon.)

name: Tyrone Soulz: Bitch Ass Pussy Mode
summary: Show Tyrone who's boss with this DLC (Difficulty Lowering Compromise), a modification to TYRONE SOULZ that caters specifically to those who struggle to rise to the occasion. The powerful Tyrone will be neutered in various ways, making him easier, but less satisfying, to defeat.

name: Typing Ninja
summary: Typing Ninja is an upcoming fast-paced typing game where players type falling words before they hit the ground, featuring Arcade and Story options. Players can use power-ups, face challenging bosses, and customize keycaps.

name: TypeSpell Journey
summary: It is a relaxing and casual software suitable for users of all ages. It can be used to learn words, practice spelling or typing. It can be a game or an educational tool, depending on how you use it.

name: Tycoon's Choice: My Secretary
summary: Tycoon's Choice: My Secretary is a modern RPG simulation mobile game based on an exciting and immersive novel storyline. Recruit all the agents and explore the immersive and amazing dating experience with gorgeous babes, you will be the tycoon of this underworld city.

name: Tyga
summary: Welcome to Tyga! It's your job to help us deliver lifesaving medicine to those who can afford it. With enough hard work, someday that could be you! See you on the road Tygan!

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 4: Gunyip!
summary: An unreleased 4th game in the Ty the Tasmanian Tiger series, which was cancelled around 2007 due to Krome Studios focusing their resources on developing ports for Star Wars: The Force Unleashed.

name: Type To Report
summary: This is an I'm on observation duty fangame where you need type the location of where the anomaly is to fix anomalies.

name: Type Galaxy
summary: Embark on the ultimate cosmic quest where your typing prowess holds the key to victory! Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled voyage through the stars in Type Galaxy, the definitive typing adventure that will leave your fingers itching for more!

name: Type-Noise: Shonen Shojo
summary: Traumatized youth trapped in 'Noise Scramble City', a labyrinth of their own fears. Amnesiac teens solve puzzles in a multi-ending escape adventure.

name: Typing Test
summary: TypingTest – Fast and Exciting Typing Challenge Where speed and accuracy meet fun! Play solo or multiplayer, improve your typing skills, and compete with friends. Available in 13 languages with detailed stats to track your progress. Join the TypingTest community and become a typing master!

name: Typing Jet
summary: Typing Jet is an educational Java typing game released for Japanese mobile devices based on the Jet Set Radio series.

name: Type & Hope!!
summary:
Type & Hope!! is a typing game created by Segawa.

Theodore is an apprentice wizard who has to take lessons from multiple teachers who will be able to teach some skills and abilities in order to reach his goal.

Type & Hope!! is an adventure game made on RPGMaker 2000 that has been released the 21st of April 2022 by Segawa.

name: Typingcommand
summary: In Typingcommand, you have to defend the Earth from a continuous stream of asteroids. Asteroids fall from the sky, threatening to destroy everything in their path. Your task is to destroy asteroids before they reach the surface of the planet.

name: Typo!
summary: Defend your computer's firewall in this fast-paced typing game, battling waves of word-based viruses in Endless or Survival mode, where speed and accuracy are your only weapons against defeat.

name: Type Them All
summary: A Pokémon quiz by AdeptCharon. Initially released on name-all-pokemon.herokuapp.com in 2020, it moved to pkmnquiz.com on November 29, 2021.

name: Type Help
summary: A puzzle-mystery game inspired by Return of the Obra Dinn, Her Story, Unheard and The Roottrees are Dead.

name: TypInc.
summary: Typinc. is a roguelike deckbuilding typing game. Type the paragraphs presented to you and maintain your streak to survive and win the game.

name: Tyrofeud
summary: Work! Sabotage! Smack! Do you have what it takes to be the favorite child?

name: Type 'n' Fish
summary: Welcome to Type 'n' Fish, a cozy indie game where your typing skills become your fishing rod. Cast your line into tranquil waters and type your way to catching a variety of unique fish, each with its own educational description.

name: Ty the Tasmanian Tiger: Bush Rescue Bundle
summary:
Includes 3 remastered games on one cart:
Ty the Tasmanian Tiger HD
Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 2: Bush Rescue HD
Ty the Tasmanian Tiger 4: Bush Rescue Returns

name: Type One
summary: Science Fiction - Third Person shooter - developed with the unreal engine 5 ( by one person ).

name: Tyler's White Lie
summary: Tyler's White Lie is a fangame based off of Dingaling's LISA: The Painful RPG. This game is all about combat. Whether in the overworld or battle menu, you, the player, will constantly be engaged in battle with waves of enemies, in labyrinth-like levels. It is also very trial and error oriented. It's a different kind of LISA experience filled with unexplored mechanics, as a result, dying may be part of the learning process.

name: TypoJam
summary: Introducing TypoJam! A rhythm game where you need to type to the song's rhythm!

name: Tyro: Legend of Whisperwood
summary: Play as Tyro, a vengeful field mouse, in this early alpha slice of our consequence-based metroidvania. Explore a hand-drawn 2D world, collect power-ups, battle challenging bosses, discover hidden lore, and experience voice-acted dialogue that brings Whisperwood to life.

name: Typomagical
summary: Type and cast your own spells! Typomagical is a spell-casting roguelike with a twist: create and invoke magic by chanting spells through your keyboard! Invoke and combine the elements and spells -- they're at your fingertips, literally!

name: Tyrant's Realm: Forbidden Fortune
summary: Descend into two deadly new levels, face brutal bosses, and battle six monstrous foes. Wield cursed weapons, unlock ancient armor, and survive twisted challenges in this grim new chapter of dark fantasy combat.

name: Typingvania
summary: A typing trainer with a focus on variety and accuracy where you type words from real books tailored to your current skill. Speed comes with accuracy and the game will gently push you to be highly accurate.

name: Typewriter Monkeys
summary: Infinite monkeys with infinite typewriters will eventually write Shakespeare... right? Find out in this cozy automation idler! Strategically place different kinds of monkeys with typewriters then level them up as you type longer and longer words!

name: Type Her to Sleep
summary: Ever spelled out your thoughts to fall asleep? Well, here, you can! Type Her to Sleep is a lo-fi, cozy typing game about typing out thoughts for a good night's sleep. Experience cute aesthetics, chill music, and an overall comfy vibe.

name: Typical Russian Quarantine
summary: TYPICAL RUSSIAN QUARANTINE is the story of an ordinary guy named Petya. When the holidays were announced in Russia, he honestly stayed at home, but one day he had to go out for buckwheat and he met people on his way who were frying kebabs...

name: Tyr
summary: Tyr is a tank shooter where strategy beats twitch reflexes. Pilot heavy-armored vehicles with unique capabilities and upgrade them as you battle for victory with your team.

name: Type
summary: a fast paced roguelike typing game with command abilities

name: Tyrone vs. Cops 2
summary: Awaken the latent power of your melanin and kill cops in this thought-provoking game on police brutality in America.

name: Typing Tales
summary: Typing Tales is a typing survivors like. Slay enemies to unlock new abilities and upgrade existing ones. Progress to uncover new game modes, maps, characters and abilities. Can you discover all secrets and get all achievements?

name: Typing Break
summary: If you can type, you can fire a gun.

name: Type Drivers
summary: In Type Drivers, the speed of your car is the speed of your typing. Race against rivals or challenge yourself in solo runs where every word counts. The faster and more accurate you type, the faster your car tears down the track.

name: TypeCaster
summary: A once-shameless thief, cursed with a slow, agonizing death, must now embark on a perilous journey to the top of the legendary Tower of Trials. This 2.5D action RPG challenges you to master lightning-fast reflexes and precise typing to battle hordes of fearsome monsters guarding each floor. Harness powerful spells, uncover treasures, and push yourself to the limits in your battle against the unknowns. Will you rise to the challenge and break the curse, or will you become another victim?

name: Typing Fireworks
summary: Typing Fireworks is a casual game where your fingers run across the keyboard to set off fireworks! You can only move to adjacent keys, escape the danger zone before the fuse burns out, and look up to enjoy the dazzling display when the fireworks bloom!

name: Type Ride
summary: "Type Ride" is a typing-based tower defense game where you summon units by typing. In a world overrun by ink lifeforms, the protagonist—once known as the "Type Rider" for her high-speed typing skills while riding a motorcycle—decides to ride her beloved bike once again to resolve the chaos.

name: Typeoids
summary:
Typeoids is a fast arcade-style typing game inspired by the classic Asteroids.
Wield your keyboard to protect yourself against the incoming asteroids threatening to crush your ship, and get performance statistics and track the progress in your typing journey.
